t = int(input())
res = []
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    li = list(map(int, input().split()))
    li.sort()
    mindif = 10000
    for k in range(n - 1):
        distance = abs(li[k] - li[k + 1])
        if distance == 0:
            mindif = 0
            break
        else:
            mindif = min(mindif, distance)
    res.append(str(mindif))
print('\n'.join(res))

import math
t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    l = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    l = sorted(l)
    mon = abs(l[0] - l[1])
    for j in range(2, n):
        mon = min(abs(l[j - 1] - l[j]), mon)
    print(mon)

n = int(input())
for i in range(n):
    sz = int(input())
    x = list(map(int, input().split(' ')))
    x.sort()
    j = 2
    mins = abs(x[0] - x[1])
    while j < len(x):
        d = abs(x[j - 1] - x[j])
        if mins > d:
            mins = d
        j += 1
    print(mins)
